value.title: This robot quickly disinfects spaces using UV-C light
value.excerpt: Disinfecting spaces such as warehouses is especially critical during the COVID-19 pandemic, but doing so while keeping workers safe can be challenging. So MIT's Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL) came up with a solution: use a robot that employs UV-C light to keep spaces clean.

images.title: This robot quickly disinfects spaces using UV-C light

value.title: Emotional support robot Robin headed to UCLA Mattel Children's hospital

value.title: In effort to fight COVID-19, MIT robot gets to work disinfecting The Greater Boston Food Bank
value.excerpt: MIT’s Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab (CSAIL) has put one of its research projects to work providing disinfection services for The Greater Boston Food Bank (GBFB), in an effort to slow the spread of COVID-19 and still allow the nonprofit to provide services to its patrons.

images.title: In effort to fight COVID-19, MIT robot gets to work disinfecting The Greater Boston Food Bank

value.title: MIT's autonomous robot uses UVC light to kill coronavirus particles on surfaces
value.excerpt: The robot is a joint project between MIT’s Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL) and Ava Robotics. As UVC light is harmful to humans, the machine is used to disinfect locations after workers have finished their shifts.

images.title: MIT's autonomous robot uses UVC light to kill coronavirus particles on surfaces
